Uses of Class
tp.pr5.instructions.exceptions.InstructionExecutionException

  • Packages that use InstructionExecutionException 
    Package Description
    tp.pr5  
    tp.pr5.instructions  

    • Uses of InstructionExecutionException in tp.pr5

      Methods in tp.pr5 that throw InstructionExecutionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NavigationModule.move()
      The method tries to move the robot following the current direction.
      If the movement is not possible because there is no street, or there is a street which is closed, then it throws an exception.

    • Uses of InstructionExecutionException in tp.pr5.instructions

      Methods in tp.pr5.instructions that throw InstructionExecutionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StormInstruction.execute() 
      void PickInstruction.execute()
      The robot adds an item to its inventory from the current place, if it exists
      void ShopInstruction.execute() 
      void DropInstruction.execute()
      The robot drops an Item from its inventory in the current place, if the item exists
      void MoveInstruction.execute()
      Moves from the current place to the next place on the current Direction.
      void DefuseInstruction.execute()
      The robot drops an Item from its inventory in the current place, if the item exists
      void TriggerInstruction.execute()
      The robot drops an Item from its inventory in the current place, if the item exists
      void OperateInstruction.execute()
      The robot uses the requested item.
      void Instruction.execute()
      Executes the Instruction.
      void TurnInstruction.execute()
      Turns the robot left or right
      void ScanInstruction.execute()
      Prints the description of a concrete item or the complete inventory of the robot
      void UndoInstruction.execute() 
      void BuyInstruction.execute()
      Try to buy the input item by from the shop.
      Precond: The shop has that item in stock WALLE has enough points to buy it WALLE haven't got the item yet.
      void Commands.undo()
      Undo this instruction, returning to the state previous of the robot to perform this instruction.
      We assume that the instruction was correctly executed previously, so it shouldn't throw any exception.
      Override this if undo the inherited instruction implies any change in the robot.
      void Instruction.undo()
      Undo this instruction, returning to the state previous of the robot to perform this instruction
      We assume that the instruction was correctly executed previously, so it only throw exception when it isn't possible undo the instruction.
      void BuyInstruction.undo()
      Undo this instruction, returning to the state previous of the robot to perform this instruction.
      We assume that the instruction was correctly executed previously, so it shouldn't throw any exception.
      Override this if undo the inherited instruction implies any change in the robot.
